primarySegments.name: Young Urban Professionals
primarySegments.description: Tech-savvy individuals who live in urban areas and are concerned about personal safety.

problemsNeeds: Need quick access to emergency contacts
Concerned about crime in urban environments
behaviors: Likely to download and set up the app immediately
Engage with app features such as location sharing

primarySegments.name: Elderly Living Alone
primarySegments.description: Older adults who live independently and may face health emergencies.

problemsNeeds: Fear of being unable to call for help
Desire for peace of mind for themselves and family
behaviors: May need assistance setting up the app
Rely on family to manage app settings

primarySegments.name: Parents with Young Children
primarySegments.description: Parents who are concerned about the safety of their children and themselves.

problemsNeeds: Concerned about child safety in public
behaviors: Likely to use app in crowded places
Use app to educate children about safety

excludedSegments.name: Rural Residents
excludedSegments.reason: Rural residents may have less immediate need for such an app due to lower crime rates and slower adoption of technology.
